Storyline:
During the bloody Warring Kingdoms age, only the ruler of Qing stands a chance to unite China into a single peaceful empire.
To survive, the six rival send hired martial arts grand masters to kill the Qin king.
Nameless, a modest provincial magistrate, tells the king during a private audience, at an exceptionally close distance awarded only to
who delivered him of such killers, how he eliminated first spear-wielding Sky in duel,
then the lovers Broken Sword and Flying Snow during the siege of their realm, Zhao.
